bio.job_description:
1)Collaborated with the development team to create and maintain an application using different LLM and Langchain and Rasa framework.2)Created an maintained SaaS products in the flask framework of python.3)Participated in code reviews, testing, and debugging4)Assisted with documentation and project management5)Contributed to the development of new features and products6)Gained hands-on experience in real-world projects, enhancing skills in Python development7)Developed strong problem-solving and analytical skills8)Demonstrated excellent communication and time-management skills1)Collaborated with the development team to create and maintain an application using different LLM and Langchain and Rasa framework.

1)Acted as a Student Volunteer for a SmartPhone-based asthma detection and monitoring project.2)Played a key role in Data Preprocessing, including NLP techniques, for deep learning and speech information processing.3)Contributed actively to the project by processing and preparing the data for analysis and model development.4)Focused on utilizing NLP techniques to enhance the effectiveness of deep learning algorithms in asthma detection and monitoring.1)Acted as a Student Volunteer for a SmartPhone-based asthma detection and monitoring project.
2)Played a key role in Data Preprocessing, including NLP techniques, for deep learning and speech information processing.
3)Contributed actively to the project by processing and preparing the data for analysis and model development.
4)Focused on utilizing NLP techniques to enhance the effectiveness of deep learning algorithms in asthma detection and monitoring.
